cpit380practice

Class StudentArrayList

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpit380practice.StudentArrayList

  • public class StudentArrayList
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that describes a student. A student has a name and a list of grades. You can get information about a student such as her/his name and grade average. A student may also have a picture.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StudentArrayList()
      No argument constructor.
      StudentArrayList(java.lang.String theName)
      Constructor that takes the name
      StudentArrayList(java.lang.String theName, int numGrades)
      Constructor that takes a name and the number of grades
      StudentArrayList(java.lang.String theName, java.util.List<java.lang.Double> theGradeList)
      Constructor that takes the name and an array of grades
      StudentArrayList(java.lang.String delimString, java.lang.String nameDelim, java.lang.String gradeDelim)
      Constructor that takes a delimited string, the name delimiter, and the grade delimiter.

      • StudentArrayList

        public StudentArrayList(java.lang.String delimString,
                java.lang.String nameDelim,
                java.lang.String gradeDelim)
        Constructor that takes a delimited string, the name delimiter, and the grade delimiter. It fills in the fields from the delimited string.
        Parameters:
        delimString - student information as a delimited string
        nameDelim - what delimits the name field from the grades
        gradeDelim - what delimits the grades

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(java.lang.Object o)
        Method to compare the current student with a passed in object
        Parameters:
        o - the object passed in
        Returns:
        negative if the current student is less than the passed object 0 if they are equal Positive if the current student is greater than the passed in object Warning this will say two students with the same name are equal!
